release_note: Fixed an issue where images would not appear
Updated for latest iOS and devices
Support for dark mode Support for new iOS gestures
Fixed an intermittent rotate ink issue
Pencil 2 double tap: Double tap on the Pencil 2 to toggle between the eraser and drawing.
Improved text editor layout on iPhone X.
Improved ink tracking with Apple Pencil
Shape recognizer: Tap the Straight Line tool when selected to toggle shape recognizer mode and draw perfect circles triangles and squares.
Improved drag and drop into other apps
High res export options: Toggle in app settings for 4x resolution exports. Smoother Ink: Improved vector ink rendering.
Fixed an issue printing PDFs on certain devices.

Transparent PNGs: Transparency is now preserved when inserting a transparent PNG. Copy paste images: You can also now copy and paste images from other apps into Noteflow. Pencil Only Mode panning: To avoid unintended touches a single finger will no longer pan but you can still pan and zoom with two fingers.
